name: Rust
description: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

passiveDescription.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>40%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.
passiveDescription.1: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>50%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.
passiveDescription.2: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>60%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.
passiveDescription.3: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>70%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.
passiveDescription.4: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>80%</cryo> but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.
